mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of Lynch Kersey
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of Lynch Kersey Nancy A. Kersey, Widow and Administrator until she resigned 08.13.1902 Jocie B. Kersey, Administrator de bonis non, beginning 08.13.1902 Recorded in Ledger Book 5, Page 212, in the Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
